```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("../December 1/Input.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
key <- NA

for(x in 1:200) {
  for(y in 1:200) {
    if((df$values[x] + df$values[y]) == 2020) {
      print(paste(df$values[x], df$values[y]))
      key <- df$values[x] * df$values[y]
      print(key)
    }
    if(!is.na(key))
      break
  }
}
```
